meanings.definition: A device used to display scrolling text for a speaker or performer to read from while appearing to look directly at the audience.
meanings.sent1: During the speech, the speaker relied on teleprompters to remember the words.
meanings.sent2: The teleprompters at the event helped the presenter deliver their lines smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The teleprompters decided to play a prank by displaying the wrong script.
meanings.sent4: The teleprompters acted as silent guides, leading the speaker through the performance.
meanings.sent5: The bright glow of the teleprompters illuminated the stage, aiding the speaker.
